title: How to Build a Hotel on Roblox

steps.headline: Open Roblox Studio.
steps.description: Go to Start Menu > All Programs > Roblox > Roblox Studio. When you arrive at Roblox, open up the place that you want to build your hotel at.

steps.headline: Press "Edit" to go into Edit mode.
steps.description: Edit Mode is easier than Build Mode, but you can go to Build Mode as well.

steps.headline: Insert the block of your choice: Insert > Object > Part.
steps.description: You can also click the Tools Icon in the top right of the game screen to use pre-made bricks.

steps.headline: Place another brick on the edge of the first brick.
steps.description: Make sure this brick you are placing is pointing vertically.

steps.headline: On top of the first brick you added, place a window brick (see-through brick) there.
steps.description: This will be the first window! When you are done placing the window brick, highlight over it and group it. Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel. Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer

steps.headline: Copy and paste the bricks you just made and connect them.
steps.description: Once you connect them, you can group them together if you want.

steps.headline: Repeat the copy-and-paste process again but this time, select  all of your bricks together at once and connect them.
steps.description: Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel. Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer.

steps.headline: Once your first wall is done, copy and paste it and connect the copied wall to the end of the first wall.
Repeat this process until you have created a square or rectangle for the bottom of the hotel.
Copy and paste the walls you just made.
steps.description: Stack/place the copied walls on top of the first walls.

steps.headline: Repeat this process until your hotel is as tall as you want it!
Build a roof for your hotel.
steps.description: To make a simple roof, stretch out a huge brick over the top (search for one in "Free Models" on the Roblox Catalog). Alternately, you can just leave it roofless!

text: Open Roblox Studio. Go to Start Menu > All Programs > Roblox > Roblox Studio. When you arrive at Roblox, open up the place that you want to build your hotel at. Press "Edit" to go into Edit mode. Edit Mode is easier than Build Mode, but you can go to Build Mode as well. Insert the block of your choice: Insert > Object > Part. You can also click the Tools Icon in the top right of the game screen to use pre-made bricks. Place another brick on the edge of the first brick. Make sure this brick you are placing is pointing vertically. On top of the first brick you added, place a window brick (see-through brick) there. This will be the first window! When you are done placing the window brick, highlight over it and group it. Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel. Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer Copy and paste the bricks you just made and connect them. Once you connect them, you can group them together if you want. Repeat the copy-and-paste process again but this time, select  all of your bricks together at once and connect them. Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel. Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer. Once your first wall is done, copy and paste it and connect the copied wall to the end of the first wall.  Repeat this process until you have created a square or rectangle for the bottom of the hotel.  Copy and paste the walls you just made. Stack/place the copied walls on top of the first walls. Repeat this process until your hotel is as tall as you want it!  Build a roof for your hotel. To make a simple roof, stretch out a huge brick over the top (search for one in "Free Models" on the Roblox Catalog). Alternately, you can just leave it roofless!
sentences: Open Roblox Studio.
Go to Start Menu > All Programs > Roblox > Roblox Studio.
When you arrive at Roblox, open up the place that you want to build your hotel at.
Press "Edit" to go into Edit mode.
Edit Mode is easier than Build Mode, but you can go to Build Mode as well.
Insert the block of your choice: Insert > Object > Part.
You can also click the Tools Icon in the top right of the game screen to use pre-made bricks.
Place another brick on the edge of the first brick.
Make sure this brick you are placing is pointing vertically.
On top of the first brick you added, place a window brick (see-through brick) there.
This will be the first window!
When you are done placing the window brick, highlight over it and group it.
Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel.
Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer Copy and paste the bricks you just made and connect them.
Once you connect them, you can group them together if you want.
Repeat the copy-and-paste process again but this time, select  all of your bricks together at once and connect them.
Continuously do this until it is as long as you want it to be for the first wall of your hotel.
Remember to group the wall all together when you are done making it longer.
Once your first wall is done, copy and paste it and connect the copied wall to the end of the first wall.
Repeat this process until you have created a square or rectangle for the bottom of the hotel.
Copy and paste the walls you just made.
Stack/place the copied walls on top of the first walls.
Repeat this process until your hotel is as tall as you want it!
Build a roof for your hotel.
To make a simple roof, stretch out a huge brick over the top (search for one in "Free Models" on the Roblox Catalog).
Alternately, you can just leave it roofless!
